heading: Personal Touch
content: Cashiers have the freedom to update their profile photos, adding a personalized touch to their interactions.

heading: Smooth Transactions
content: From payments to purchases, cashiers facilitate seamless transactions for enhanced customer experiences.

heading: Product Proficiency
content: Cashiers effortlessly navigate through product lists, leveraging filters for categories and names, and even sorting items alphabetically and by price.

heading: Admin Mastery
content: Admins step in with the power to manage users, create, update, and delete cashiers, and exercise control over product lists and categories.
